title: Ep. 38. The Crystal Kingdom - Chapter Ten
description: It's time for the final confrontation. Who's been hunting our heroes all throughout this campaign? What's Lucas really after? Why is Merle getting just completely boned in every fight? Answers to these questions and more linger just behind the play button. Taako has a plan. Magnus has a snack. Merle says his prayers.
author: shows@themcelroy.family (The McElroys)
